name: SwftCoin
description: SWFT Blockchain describes itself as a 'next-generation worldwide cross-chain transfer protocol that combines blockchain, machine learning, and big data'. It reportedly offers one-click in-wallet transfers, decentralized transfers, and price limit trades, which aims to give users a fast, affordable, and safe crypto transfer experience. SwftCoin (SWFTC), the token used for facilitating transfers, was created to provide users with transparent and low fees.
